txt.en:
'Are you enjoying the Springfest? It is a fine time of year! But my friend Gísi, who loves this festival most, is nowhere to be found. He travelled to the Spring Planting of Bree many days ago to try his luck in the hedge-maze there, but I've heard not a word from him since.

'If you go to the maze, could you look for him? I know that he would not wish to miss the festival of the dwarves. I am worried that some strange fate has befallen him.

'Just...try not to get lost among the greens yourself before you speak to Gísi.'

'The Springfest! Goodness -- do you know I had nearly forgotten all about it? Because -- pardon me, my eyes; they will not stop tearing for all the laughing I do these days! Oh, if only you could see! The mirth! I may not go back for many days yet.'
'You should go to Bree, traveller! You will find the Hedge Maze in the Horse-fields.'

The dwarf Gísi was supposed to be back from the Spring Planting in Bree several days ago, and Mákr desires to find out what has become of him.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Talk to Gísi at the Horse-fields in Bree
Gísi is at the Festival Grounds in Bree, near the hedge-maze on the Horse-fields.\n\nYou should bring Mákr's message to Gísi before the festival days come to a close for the season.
